nodes.bodyText: Dumb question here: is it safe for validateCurrentSnapshot to not check meta.currentSnapshot() != null in prior? If requiredCurrentSnapshotId is not null and meta.currentSnapshot() is null then NPE would occur, but I'm not sure the possibility about it.
Looks like we should fix that one as well. I think you should be able to FF to any snapshot if there is no current snapshot. Thanks @HeartSaVioR!
